pages.text: Furcacauda was a deep water jawless fish. Its tail looked like a crescent and its body plan was quite reminiscent of modern tropical fish. It was discovered that Furcacauda may have had a stomach, being the first vertebrate to do so, meaning that stomachs developed before jaws.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
